name: vivo iQOO 15 Ultra
highlights:
Not announced yet

Android 16, up to 5 major upgrades
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY:
Water resistant
Built-in cooling fan
Pressure sensitive zones (600Hz touch-sensing)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR Vivid, 1000 nits (typ), 2600 nits (HBM), 6000 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 5 major Android upgrades, OriginOS 6
PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.9, 24mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.6, 85mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.1, 15mm (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, AF

COMMS.Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, PPS, PD
40W wireless
Bypass charging
